description:
cmd/godoc: emit id's for constants and variables

Fixes issue 5077.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go
LGTM but i don't suppose it's testable?

godoc should have tests, but doesn't. doing it well is non-trivial.


On Wed, Mar 27, 2013 at 3:04 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM but i don't suppose it's testable?
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8021044/<https://codereview.appspot.com/8021044/>
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=cbbdf95d3430 ***

cmd/godoc: emit id's for constants and variables

Fixes issue 5077.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8021044
